CustomField.formula:
IF( CONTAINS($User.UIThemeDisplayed, 'Theme4'),
IF( ISBLANK( breadwinner_qbo__Internal_Status__c ), IF(breadwinner_qbo__Type__c = 'Bill', IF( breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Paid', IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/bills_g.png", "Paid"), IF( breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Overdue',IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/bills_r.png", "Overdue"),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/bills_o.png", "Open/Partial"))),IF(breadwinner_qbo__Status__c='Closed',IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/po_g.png", "Closed"),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/po_o.png", "Open")) ), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/lightning_x.png", "Deleted / Voided") ),
IF( ISBLANK( breadwinner_qbo__Internal_Status__c ), IF(breadwinner_qbo__Type__c = 'Bill', IF( breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Paid', IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/bills_g.png", "Paid", 18,18),IF( breadwinner_qbo__Status__c = 'Overdue',IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/bills_r.png", "Overdue", 18,18),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/bills_o.png", "Open/Partial", 18,18))),IF(breadwinner_qbo__Status__c='Closed',IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/po_g.png", "Closed", 18,18),IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/po_o.png",'Open',18,18)) ), IMAGE("https://s3.amazonaws.com/cdn.breadwinner/voided_deleted.png", "Deleted / Voided") ) )
CustomField.label: Status Flag
